bibl.title: Demotic Ostraca and Other Inscriptions from the Sacred Animal Necropolis, North Saqqara
bibl.note: O. dem. Saqqara 1-383, I. dem. Saqqara 1-13. - Introduction. - Section One: Literary Texts, Scribal Exercises and Memoranda [DO Saqqara 1-17]. - Section Two: Exercises on Writing-Boards and Similar Items [DO Saqqara 18-30]. - Section Three: Demotic Jar-Labels, Dedications and Deliveries to Cults, and Similar Inscriptions [DO Saqqara 31-383]. - Section Four: Some Demotic Inscriptions on Objects of Limestone or Wood [DI Saqqara 1-13]. - Pp. 359-363: General observations on the demotic ostraca and jar-labels from the Sacred Animal Necropolis. - Concordance. Index.
bibl.seg: John David Ray, Demotic Ostraca and Other Inscriptions from the Sacred Animal Necropolis, North Saqqara = Texts from Excavations. 16.
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2013, 4°, vi-392 pp., nombr. figg. et 1 CD-ROM. ISBN 978-0-85698-217-0. £90.

O. dem. Saqqara 1-383, I. dem. Saqqara 1-13. - Introduction. - Section One: Literary Texts, Scribal Exercises and Memoranda [DO Saqqara 1-17]. - Section Two: Exercises on Writing-Boards and Similar Items [DO Saqqara 18-30]. - Section Three: Demotic Jar-Labels, Dedications and Deliveries to Cults, and Similar Inscriptions [DO Saqqara 31-383]. - Section Four: Some Demotic Inscriptions on Objects of Limestone or Wood [DI Saqqara 1-13]. - Pp. 359-363: General observations on the demotic ostraca and jar-labels from the Sacred Animal Necropolis. - Concordance. Index.
C.R. par Koen Donker van Heel, BASP 52 (2015) pp. 331-333.
